job_tasks.phrase: create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes the core objective of developing models for generating realistic synthetic human performance using text-to-video, which is a generative AI task.

job_tasks.phrase: helping with the research and development of our generative avatar performance abilities.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions research and development of generative abilities, aligning with model creation and adaptation.

job_tasks.phrase: given conditioning signals such as audio, video or text you will be helping create models that guides the avatar's verbal and non verbal cues.
job_tasks.justification: Details the process of creating models that take specific inputs to generate desired outputs (avatar cues), which is model development.

job_tasks.phrase: create high quality, production ready code
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on creating production-ready code, a core software engineering task.
Refers to taking ownership of production pipelines, which is a key aspect of MLOps/LLMOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Building libraries to accelerate the iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.).
job_tasks.justification: Building libraries and abstracting functionality are software development tasks aimed at improving the development workflow.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing, maintaining and deploying Computer Vision algorithms and models to update our product,
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on developing algorithms and models, a core ML task.
Mentions integrating CI/CD, which are MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
job_tasks.justification: Encompasses the entire lifecycle of an ML model, from initial concept to production deployment, which is the domain of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
job_tasks.justification: Adapting existing solutions implies fine-tuning or modifying models to fit specific product requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on code quality, testing, and code reviews, which are fundamental software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Writing clean and efficient code, and defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
job_tasks.justification: Emphasizes writing clean, efficient code and establishing best practices, core software engineering principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the transition from experimental prototypes to functional, deployable solutions, a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the development of production-quality software and a full-stack approach, emphasizing software engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: passion for working on cutting edge problems
soft_skills.justification: Expresses enthusiasm and drive for engaging with advanced and novel challenges, indicative of a learning mindset.
Directly states taking ownership, a key aspect of this category.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
soft_skills.justification: Participating in code reviews and contributing to a shared codebase are collaborative activities.

soft_skills.phrase: Writing clean and efficient code, and defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
soft_skills.justification: Taking initiative to define best practices and owning the codebase demonstrates ownership and innovation.

profile.rationale: The role involves a substantial amount of both core software engineering tasks (building production-ready code, pipelines, libraries, CI/CD, full ML lifecycle) and generative AI specialization tasks (research and development of generative avatar performance, creating models for text-to-video, adapting solutions). The generative AI focus is clear from the description of synthetic humans and text-to-video.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed, providing specific responsibilities that map directly to the coding book categories. The focus on generative AI is unambiguous.
